precondition: System installed; Agent deployed; CLI connected to agent
objective: Verify behavior of ip addr task is similar to ip addr command

steps.expectedResult: agent1: output should closely match step1, omitting any interfaces that do not have an address. agent2: Should include all interfaces and their type, mac address, ipv4/6 addresses
steps.description: On the target machine's terminal run ip addr.

steps.expectedResult: a table is returned with entries for network ips/interfaces. the rows in the CLI are formatted like this: ens160: 192.168.10.109
steps.description: Run the ip task on the CLI.

name: ip addr
